text_logic_form: The pentagons $ABCDE$ and $PQRST$ are similar to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The pentagons $ABCDE$ and $PQRST$ are similar to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BA$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $DC$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $ED$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $RS$ is $3$ units.
The lengths of the lines $BA$ and $BC$ are equal.
The lengths of the lines $EA$ and $DC$ are equal.
The lengths of the lines $PQ$ and $QR$ are equal.
The lengths of the lines $RS$ and $PT$ are equal.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $CB$, $DC$, $DE$, $EA$ forming a pentagon $ABCDE$.
There are lines $PQ$, $QR$, $RS$, $ST$, $TP$ forming a pentagon $PQRST$.
